meanings.definition: To convert or be converted into pyrite.
meanings.sent1: The ancient fossil was pyritised over time, turning into a shiny mineral.
meanings.sent2: The organic matter in the rock pyritised, creating a metallic sheen.
meanings.sent3: The dinosaur bone decided to pyritise itself for a new look.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas pyritised into brilliant solutions for the company.
meanings.sent5: The old shipwreck pyritised into a treasure trove of golden crystals.
